summary: Just a small fix for the Nord Hero Bow....
descriptionHtml:
Just a small fix for the Nord Hero Bow that let\'s you improve it like any other Sky Forge crafted weapons. I have made it for my self but since I haven\'t found anything that will fix this issue I decided to upload it here. This should be compatible with any other mods out there since the weapon itself is untouched by this esp. I believe that the screen shots are not necessary. Happy hunting.

Sorry for My English.
author: Me
